original_text: My Christian friends, I pray that our Lord Jesus Christ will continue to be very kind to you. I pray that he will help you in your spirits. Amen. This is true!
korean_text: 형제들아 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 은혜가 너희 심령에 있을지어다 아멘

sentences.original_text: I pray that our Lord Jesus Christ will continue to be very kind to you
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 주 예수 그리스도께서 너희에게 계속해서 친절하시기를 기도합니다

sentences.original_text: I pray that he will help you in your spirits
